name: Dice Dungeon (Marinosa)
description:
Made during Mini Jam 30.
Made with GB Studio.

Try to escape the dungeon with luck! The further you get, the more luck you'll need...

Z = A
X = B
Arrows = D-Pad
Enter = Start

Press Start to change character at any time!
Trying to leave the dungeon through the entrance will reset the level.
